name: Rock Pond Man
description:
Submission to the Global Game Jam 2017 with the theme "Waves".

You are a Rock Pond Man, cleaning up a pond full of garbage by pushing litter around with ripples. 20 regular levels, 8 challenge levels, and 3 secret levels. PS: Quack.

Production credits are in-game. I designed and implemented the stages and contributed miscellaneous code for obstacles.

Git: https://github.com/j-eriksmith/RockPondMan
